alert.note: Alert for Central Yampa River Basin; Flat Tops; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 1:39PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Rio Blanco County through 215 PM MDT... At 139 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles south of Meeker, or 36 miles northwest of Glenwood Springs, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Rio Blanco County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Yampa River Basin; Flat Tops; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus
